author: TechRadar India Bureau
title: Brands forced to focus on new online strategies
description: Many brands have come up with alternatives to keep up the spirits of people staying at home as digital is the new normal.
content: With the lockdown in India in place for around a month now, all activities that required individuals to venture out of their homes were majorly hit. But even as people maintain social distance and stay at home, they still need to pass their time besides binge… [+2059 chars]
